label: A3B4_oP14_49_ej_2q-001
title: $\delta$-V$_{4}$D$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
$\delta$-V$_{4}$D$_{3}$ is the only completely ordered structure in the Vanadium-Hydrogen/Deuterium system (Asano, 1973).  Even then, the deuterium sites are only 98\% occupied. 
 The data for this structure was obtained at 88K. 
 While (Asano, 1973) placed this in space group $Pcc2$ \#27, (Cenzual, 1991) showed that the published coordinates placed the system in space group $Pccm$ \#49.
